Title: Grants a sales and compensating use tax exemption for the sale of items designed to ensure the safe handling and storage of firearms
Summary: Grants a sales and compensating use tax exemption for the sale of items designed to ensure the safe handling and storage of firearms including safe storage depositories, firearm safety locks and trigger locks.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to granting a sales and compensating use tax exemption for the sale of items designed to ensure the safe handling and storage of firearms
